1111000011100101 1101001110001110 1 -> sum: 1100010001110100, cout: 1

1011010100000011 1011010101010100 0 -> sum: 0110101001010111, cout: 1
0000001100001010 0011101011110100 1 -> sum: 0011110111111111, cout: 0
0010111011010100 1001110110001100 0 -> sum: 1100110001100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
